..dude it's serious crap  :)

Yes this is crap. Loud, clear and obvious crap. On the other hand, it's historic, cult crap. The storyline beats most highschool movies, the acting beats most disney channel gunk. It's worth a laugh if one can spare the bandwidth and the time.
